defs: (mus.) in Karnāṭaka system, a rāga (musical mode) derived from the main mode Kharaharapriya.
(astrol.) the planet Rāhu.
the quality or state of being straight; straightness.

ಸೊಪ್ಪು ಸವದಿ soppu savadi = ಸೊಪ್ಪು ಸದೆ; ಸೊಪ್ಪುಹಾಕು soppu hāku (dial.) to drive (an evil spirit or spirits) out or away using the foliage of certain plants; 2. (fig.) to pay heed and attention; to regard (as valuable); ಸೊಪ್ಪು ನಾರಾಗಿ ಬಡಿ soppu nārāgi baḍi to crush by beating heavily; ಸೊಪ್ಪು ಸೊಗಡು sopu sogaḍu = ಸೊಪ್ಪು ಸದೆ; ಸೊಪ್ಪು ಸದೆ soppu sade foliage and litter.

ಸೊಪ್ಪಾಗು1 soppāgu to lose strength, vigour completely and become very weak; 2. to become helpless, ineffective from or as from defeat; 3. (things) to be strewn loosely or disorderly; 4. to become completely distorted or to lose the original shape (from or as from squeezing). ಸೊಪ್ಪುಸೊವಡಾಗು soppu sovaḍāgu = ಸೊಪ್ಪಾಗು1.
